detaileddescription.para: Event handlers can be attached to from your program to be notified of updates to discord. Each one can be hooked by attaching a lambda, std::function or std::bind or equivalent to the event with one of the functions below, for example to be notified of messages being sent, assuming you have an instance of dpp::cluster called bot:

sect2.title: dpp::cluster::on_voice_state_update ()
sect2.para: Be notified of a change in voice state for a user

sect2.title: dpp::cluster::on_log ()
sect2.para: Be notified of log lines to implement your own logging of bot activity

sect2.title: dpp::cluster::on_interaction_create ()
sect2.para: Be notified of use of a slash command on a server

sect2.title: dpp::cluster::on_guild_delete ()
